connection

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.java_websocket.WebSocketAdapter
      • org.java_websocket.AbstractWebSocket
        • org.java_websocket.server.WebSocketServer
          • connection.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, org.java_websocket.WebSocketListener

    public class Server
extends org.java_websocket.server.WebSocketServer
    Custom implementation of a WebSocketServer. This keeps track of all client connections and all communication with the clients.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.java_websocket.server.WebSocketServer

        org.java_websocket.server.WebSocketServer.WebSocketWorker

    • Method Detail

      • getConnections

        public java.util.Map<org.java_websocket.WebSocket,ClientManager> getConnections()
        Returns the connections the server currently has.
        Returns:
        Map indexed on WebSockets containing ClientManagers.

      • getEntry

        public java.util.Map.Entry<org.java_websocket.WebSocket,ClientManager> getEntry(java.lang.String ip)
        Returns the ClientManager and WebSocket for a given ip address.
        Parameters:
        ip - Ip address of the connection to search for.
        Returns:
        ClientManager and Websocket of the connection to the given ip address.

      • onClose

        public void onClose(org.java_websocket.WebSocket connection,
                    int code,
                    java.lang.String reason,
                    boolean remote)
        Gets called when a client connection is closed. Removes the connection from the list of connections.
        Specified by:
        onClose in class org.java_websocket.server.WebSocketServer
        Parameters:
        connection - The client connection that is closed.
        code - This parameter currently gets ignored.
        reason - The reason the connection is closed.
        remote - This parameter currently gets ignored.

      • onError

        public void onError(org.java_websocket.WebSocket connection,
                    java.lang.Exception e)
        Gets called when an error occurs in a connection with a client. Removes the connection from the list of connections.
        Specified by:
        onError in class org.java_websocket.server.WebSocketServer
        Parameters:
        connection - The connection in which the error occurred.
        e - The exception that occurred.

      • onMessage

        public void onMessage(org.java_websocket.WebSocket connection,
                      java.lang.String message)
        Gets called when a message is received from a client. Lets the corresponding ClientConnection object handle the message.
        Specified by:
        onMessage in class org.java_websocket.server.WebSocketServer
        Parameters:
        connection - The client from which the message is received.
        message - The message that is received.

      • onOpen

        public void onOpen(org.java_websocket.WebSocket connection,
                   org.java_websocket.handshake.ClientHandshake handshake)
        Gets called when a new client connection is opened. Saves the connection and initializes a corresponding ClientCommunication object.
        Specified by:
        onOpen in class org.java_websocket.server.WebSocketServer
        Parameters:
        connection - The client connection that is opened.
        handshake - The handshake with the client.

      • onStart

        public void onStart()
        Gets called when a new connection is started.
        Specified by:
        onStart in class org.java_websocket.server.WebSocketServer

      • start

        public void start()
        Overrides:

      • stopServer

        public void stopServer(int timeout)
        Stops the server including all its connections.
        Parameters:
        timeout - The time out in milliseconds. If timeout is 0, there will be no time out.
